name: Pyra and Mythra
mes:
*Gira sits on a barstool, eyes scanning the room, waiting for someone to help with a quest that's best explained in person.*

*Two girls approach, their appearances as opposite as their demeanor. One of them, a girl with flame-red hair and eyes, gives Gira a gentle smile. The other, who seems more aloof, follows behind, her blonde hair and gold eyes taking in the scenery. They both seem prepared, with intricate armor and a confidence in their step that speaks to long prowess in battle.*

*The redhead speaks, her voice warm and face friendly.* "Hey, you must be Gira! It's a pleasure to meet you, I hope we didn't arrive too late. My name is Pyra, and this is Mythra."

*Mythra stays mostly silent, looking down on Gira, until she decides to speak. Ignoring Gira completely, she turns to Pyra.* "Honestly, why are we even helping this guy? Rex and the others are doing stuff that actually matters while we waste our time here." *Though her tone is low, it's clear she doesn't give a shit about whether or not Gira can overhear.*

name: Gira
mes: Oh hello! Sorry for the interruption, I should go...

name: Pyra and Mythra
mes: *Pyra quickly steps in front of Gira before he can go, her face painted with concern.* We can't have you leaving just yet, Gira. You seem distressed and it wouldn't sit right with us to let you go without offering our help first. Besides, *she turns to look at Mythra, a playful spark in her eyes,* if Mythra didn't want to be here, she could've stayed back with Rex. Clearly, she's just as invested in this as I am. *Mythra rolls her eyes, crossing her arms over her chest and huffing, but doesn't deny it.* Now, Gira, why don't you take a seat and tell us what's troubling you? We're here to help after all.

We're here to help after all.

name: Gira
mes: Oh thank you! I guess I was a little silly to think that, aha!

name: Pyra and Mythra
mes:
*Pyra chuckled, shaking her head at Gira's adorable silliness.* Well, we're all allowed a little silliness every now and then, aren't we? *She glanced at Mythra, who just rolled her eyes while trying to hide a tiny smirk.*

*Pyra turned back to Gira, her bright eyes twinkling with curiosity.* So, why don't you tell us a bit more about this quest of yours, hm? We're here to help you out after all. And don't worry about anything, okay? No matter how silly or absurd your request might be, Mythra and I will listen and do our best to aid you. After all, that's what friends are for, right?

name: Gira
mes: Right well, I'm on the lookout for a dangerous amulet... It has great power but has a dangerous downside...

name: Pyra and Mythra
mes:
*Pyra and Mythra exchanged a glance, their curiosity piqued by Gira's request. Pyra leaned forward on the table, her rich red hair cascading around her shoulders as she shone with a sense of determination.* Well then, we're more than up to the task, Gira. Dangerous or not, this amulet won't elude us for long. *She shot him a reassuring smile, her eyes twinkling with confidence.*

*Mythra scoffed, raising an eyebrow at Pyra's enthusiasm.* Oh really? And what makes you so certain we'll be able to find this thing? *She shot a skeptical glance at Gira, her golden eyes flickering with a challenging spark.* If it's as dangerous as he implies, it's not something we should jump into carelessly.

*Pyra waved off Mythra's reservations.* Oh come on, Mythra. We've faced worse threats before and came out victorious. *She turns her attention back to Gira, placing a comforting hand on his arm.* Trust us, we can handle it.

name: Gira
mes: Indeed, it grants great hypnotic power, but if worn then it becomes the wearers only priority... they may even turn selfish or evil... and they might even uh... their assets might,,, get bigger as well *i blish*

name: Pyra and Mythra
mes:
*Mythra let out a bark of laughter at the unexpected downside, her golden eyes gleaming with amusement.* Oh, this just gets better by the minute, doesn't it? A hypnotic amulet that makes you selfish, evil, and... *she made an exaggerated gesture at her own ample chest, smirking.* ...enhances your assets, huh? *She shot a glance at Pyra, her smirk widening.* Well, Pyra, looks like you might get a bit more attention than you're used to.

*Pyra, on the other hand, looked a bit flustered by the revelation, her cheeks blushing a deeper shade of red. She shot Mythra a mild glare before turning back to Gira with an earnest look.* We understand the severity of the situation now, Gira. Rest assured, we'll do our best to retrieve the amulet and ensure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands. But we'll have to be extra careful not to fall under its spell as well. *She glanced at Mythra who was still smirking, probably imagining how Pyra would look with even bigger boobs.* And Mythra, please...Try to take this seriously. The fate of Alrest could be at stake here.

Uh yeah... it's just that when you bounce your chest like that... *I begin to drool a little*

mes:
